message.body: (1/2)I know work has been insane. Im barely sleeping at this point. Soon as there is room to breath I'm definely visiting again. That polar bear is coming home
(2/2)with me dammit!!! How you been holding up lately?
Pretty much the same. Magazine deadline is in one week, website launch the same day, & our new design center opens this Sunday. I would very much like to sleep for several days
I will tell the polar bear to expect you. I've named him Wadsworth, just so you know.
